snippet.title: Le Tour de France 2011 - PS3 | Xbox 360 - official video game preview trailer HD
snippet.description:
Please don't forget to SUBSCRIBE to http://www.youtube.com/MrPlayerism4 - Rapid firing the latest game news, trailers, screens and art that true players don't wanna miss out on.

Le Tour de France 2011 is headed to PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 in one week, from the studio that brought you the renowned Pro Cycling Manager PC series. Check out this dynamic video trailer and browse the official website to get geared up for cycling action. The video reveals a glimpse of the intense races that await you: sprinting shoulder to shoulder with cycling champions, climbing up grueling mountain passes and navigating dangerous descents. This is only a fraction of the many surprises you will find along the 21 official stages in the 2011 edition of this unique cycling simulator. The official site opens its doors today, so it is the perfect opportunity to learn more about the game. With images, video and exclusive information of all kinds, the site contains everything you need to know about the game. Just one week from today, European players can plunge into the racing action. On July 1st, Le Tour de France launches on PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360. www.tourdefrance-thegame.com
